alert.note: Alert for Blount (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 2:33PM CDT until August 07 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Blount County in central Alabama... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 233 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blountsville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oneonta, Blountsville, Cleveland, Locust Fork, Altoona, Snead, Susan Moore, Walnut Grove, Fairview, Hayden, Nectar, Rosa, McLarty, Blount Springs, Bangor, Strawberry, Brooksville, Easley, Chamblees Mill and Fowler Spring. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
